alert.note: Alert for Travis; Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 7:37PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Williamson, eastern Travis and northwestern Bastrop Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 736 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pflugerville to near Tanglewood Forest. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Austin, Round Rock, Cedar Park, Georgetown, Pflugerville, Taylor, Elgin, Tanglewood Forest, Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, Windemere, Hutto, Manor, West Lake Hills, Rollingwood, Thrall, Camp Swift, Coupland, Shady Hollow, Onion Creek and Barton Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
